name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;Well... that's that... Whew! Time to report back to King Sages!
speak;Sal;I bring bad news.|It appears as you said, more bandit strikes...
# This is how you tell a character to change their expression
speak;Sages14;So the rumours are true...|I'm slowing down...|I won't be able to help my people...
speak;Sal;I beg to differ. One man cannot stop crime.
speak;Sages14;The moral dilemma of bandits...|How do we treat them? They are people, yet treat others as unworthy...
speak;Sal;While true, we can't let them terrorise our upstanding citizens.|I'll dispense of anyone you need, your Majesty.
speak;Sages14;Thank you, Sal. I am ever thankful for your duty.|Actually, I do need something of you...

speak;Sages14;King Gildao of Aurelia has passed...|I must send an envoy to the coronation of his son.|I'd attend myself, but, in this state...|Even if my fragility impedes me, I would see it prudent to keep up relations...
speak;Sal;Oh erm... Aurelia...|I will do what I must, but what about your son?|Should he not attend in your place?

speak;Sages14;You know him, always galavanting off...|If only he could take his position as prince seriously...|Anyway, I will also assign Nako and Pikno to your group...|Travelling the continent in these times is a gruelling task indeed...
speak;Nako;Ah, are we late? Please forgive me, your Majesty.
speak;Nako;Oh! Sal! Hello!|A pleasure to work with you!
speak;Sal;Well, nice to meet you too! Let's er... Get this show on the road?
speak;Sages14;Do not worry about me...|Everyone here will take care of it...|Take this gold too, for weapons and whatnot...
speak;Pikno;Thank you, now, time to proceed.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Oh, mighty Goddess...|Father... Please... Care for him...|Show me your light. I am so lost...
speak;EmelinePrincess;Ah... Sir Skill.|It is all I can do... Father cannot return...|I must ask for her guidance...
speak;Skill;...|You're sure that the Goddess can hear everything?
speak;EmelinePrincess;Sir Skill! Surely you jest!|These sacred lands are her gift...|She sees everything on her soil...
speak;Skill;Well, er, praying for your brother's prosperity might help?|I'm not so sure.
speak;EmelinePrincess;You will be by his side, not mine, when his is king?

speak;Skill;That may be.|I worked myself to the bone to rise the ranks...|All so I could assist your family.|I may not be able to devote my time solely to you.|My apologies... I value you dearly, your Highness.
speak;EmelinePrincess;You are a fine man, Sir Skill...|Tell me, why can I not wield the sword of my ancestors?|All of them could use the divine sword of the Goddess, Ascalon...|All, except me.

speak;Skill;That... I do not know.|But so what? You don't need it!|Your strength will be enough to support your brother and country.|Now, I beg your leave. I must aid the preparations for the ceremony.
speak;EmelinePrincess;...|Support only...|Left unnoticed and straying from her light...|No. This will not be enough.|I cannot live forgotten in the shadows for the rest of my life...
